Review_Text: What a beautiful, intelligent and insightful piece of work. An illumination of, arguably, Ireland's greatest artist. Moved me to tears. Especially, his painting, " Death for Only One". A film so beautifully crafted... it will stay with me for the rest of my life. Anyone with an interest in the arts and painting in particular, for them it is a must see. Thank you. A milestone in documentary film-making.
